testcase.name: Make the Primary call to check posts status
testcase.system-out: * url 'https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/' ............................. passed * print "In first folder and ran 01_test.feature" ......................... passed Given path 'posts' ........................................................ passed When method GET ........................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed Then print "Title of the post with Id : 1 is --> ", response[0].title .... passed
